Subject: Data retained for auditing and archive data retrieval
Description: Need to see how long and where to set the data retaining and had how to access the archive data
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
In NEA, if you Expend the File System and Expand FSAC System Scan, Expand Configure, and click Queries.
Click Query Properties and click Configure, you will see the Retention under the Scan Filters.
What_We_Know__c: Customer needs instructions/guidance to specific locations within Netwrix Auditor to view/modify Data Retention and accessing Archive data
Next_Steps__c: Sent out first-response email to customer detailing instructions and linking kb articles.
Solution_Comment__c: I provided information to the customer regarding the archive and the retention
